q: : " Army commandoes were dispatched over the weekend to protect the 108-year-old museum in Cairo's Tahrir square, where many of the nation's protesters have gathered over the last week. " I was so worried, Zahi Hawass , Egypt's chief archeologist and secretary general of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, told The Washington Post.`` I have been protecting antiquities all my life. Allen Iverson had 36 points, Anthony Parker added 33 and Kenyon Martin shut down Toronto all-star Chris Bosh late as Denver rallied to beat the Toronto Raptors 109-100 on Sunday afternoon. Kenyon Martin 's defense on Chris Bosh was incredible and got better as the game went on, George Karl said.`` You win games with stops more than maLeBron James shots.
